name: Rachael's Hungarian Turkey Burgers Studded with Smoked Gouda
ingredients: 1 small red onion, chopped fine, 2 1/2 ounces
1/2 red bell pepper, chopped fine, about 2 1/2 ounces
1/3 pound smoked Gouda cheese, cut in 1/4" dice

instructions.en: In a large bowl, mix all ingredients except the cheese and oil.
instructions.sk: Vo veľkej miske zmiešajte všetky ingrediencie okrem syra a oleja.
instructions.ja: 大きなボウルに、チーズと油以外の全ての材料を入れて混ぜます。

instructions.en: Gently fold in the diced cheese.
instructions.ja: ダイス状に切ったチーズを優しく混ぜ込みます。

instructions.en: Shape into 4 patties, about an inch thick.
instructions.ja: 約2.5cm厚の4つのパティに成形します。

instructions.en: Heat the oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat.
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte olej vo veľkej nepriľnavej panvici na strednom ohni.
instructions.ja: 大きな非粘着性フライパンで中火で油を熱します。

instructions.en: Cook the burgers 5-6 minutes per side or until done to your liking.
instructions.sk: Smažte fašírky 5-6 minút z každej strany alebo kým nie sú hotové podľa vašej chuti.
instructions.ja: バーガーを片面5〜6分、または好みの焼き加減になるまで調理します。

notes: Makes 4 servings. Can be frozen. 1/3 pound of cheese equals 5 1/4 ounces or 151 grams. You can use any kind of cheese if smoked Gouda is not available.
